main: ^Hey, if you're going to buy fish, talk to the other person manning the market.
section1: ^Yes, but I'm in charge of the special supply orders, not the day-to-day purchases.
section2: ^Yep, when the customers need something specific, that's my job!
^See this board behind me? Well, that's all the orders I have for today.
^Right now, I'm just waiting on the shipments to arrive.
